summary: And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.
cast: Matthew Fox|Jeffrey Donovan|Quinn McColgan|Clara Lago|Valeria Vereau|Eduardo Fedriani|Daniel Bargueño|Adam Zambryzcki|Matt Devere|Alex Hafner|Julio Perillán|Dénes Kiss|Lili Bordán|Jeremy Wheeler|Katharine Bubbear|Kára Jurány|István Bán|Laura Juhász|Emília Gresicki|Nikolett Takács|Orsolya Bene
title: Extinction
